abstract: A constant indicating that the feature is always hidden.
overview:
## Discussion

Use `mapkit.FeatureVisibility.Hidden` to hide adaptive map controls, such as the compass and scale. You can show or hide controls that aren’t adaptive by setting map properties to `true` or `false`, respectively.

The following example shows how to always hide the compass, the map type, and the zoom controls:

items.description: A constant indicating that feature visibility adapts to the current map state.
items.name: Adaptive

items.description: A constant indicating that the feature is always visible.
items.name: Visible

title: Hidden
